title: Minuscule is here
content: Since it was already debated on Typophile [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015234232/http:/www.typophile.com/node/14163) or [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015234232/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19411), it may be of interest that finally, 2005 TDC award winning _Minuscule_ by Thomas Huot-Marchand is available through Thomas’ foundry [http://www.256tm.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015234232/http:/www.256tm.com/en/minuscule.htm). I have not yet had the time to look at well-printed samples, but as far as I can judge for now: Congratulations to Thomas!
author: Stephan Kurz

comments.content: It's a remarkable piece of work.
